name: Ly Son Island - the kingdom of male garlic
description:
Ly Son belongs to Quang Ngai province, which is 24 kilometer-long toward the northeast of Quang Ngai. It takes you an hour to travel on boat to Ly Son Island and you will be surprised by an amazingly beautiful island with its unique landscape and social value. Ly Son is also well-known for the name of “male garlic”. People call this place is the kingdom of “male garlic”.

The natural beauty gives you a wonderful impression of pure ocean, smoothly sandy beaches, green male garlic fields. Five mountain peaks soaring under the vast sea and blue sky capture the whole view of island. Wild and unspoilt beauty make people feel a slow, peaceful life and seen to be love this country more and more.
